cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Education and Labor on March 24, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7, Paycheck Fairness Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DeLAURO:
H.R. 7.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 of the United States
Constitution and Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H250]

latestAction.text: Cloture on the motion to proceed to the measure not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 227. (CR S3981)

title: Paycheck Fairness Act
